questions.question: Now pass it to the next person to you
Tell a story about the building
Change the building so that it is taller

Ask the next person to close their eyes 

 Do 3 changes on the building

Now, pass it to the person next to you! 

 Ask them to explain the building while blindfolded
Ask them to open their eyes

Instruction recieved: 

1. Build a tower with 10 bricks 
2. Tell a story about the building 
3. Change the building so that is taller 
4. Do 3 changes on the building 
5. Explain when blindfolded
